allow:
Bash(function" errors when trying to display MEGA cloud files.

Fixed by converting the internal Map to an array in the store getter,
matching the pattern used by Google Drive cache.

Changes:
- Import ''derived'' from svelte/store in MEGA cache
- Convert cache.store getter to derive from internal Map
- Flatten Map values into a single array of CloudVolumeMetadata

This fixes MEGA login not updating cloud page views and placeholders
not showing after authentication.
